segments.text: Hi , Ellen ! How is it going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can ’ t be better ! Bob , aren ’ t you glad the semester is over ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yep ! Are you going to the rock concert Friday night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn ’ t think much of it . Are you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Would you like go with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ ll have to buy your own ticket though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you broke again ? Let me treat you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! When did you come into so much cash ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , I am a waitress at the student center . Anyway now those final exams are almost over . I ’ d love a night out .
segments.speaker: S2
